channel.title: Government Contracts on FinanClub

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:52 Chances: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure’s authorization to host classified missions by the U.S. Intelligence Community indicates potential growth in the government sector. Oracle’s involvement in AI and its recognition as part of the AI revolution could position the company for future success. The authorization to host Top Secret/Sensitive Compartmented Information (TS/SCI) missions could expand Oracle’s presence in the government and security sectors.
